content:
We can definitely add that to the table. Since you don't have the exact figures for last month, we'll just add the $50 to the Gifts category for Month 1.

Here's the updated table:

| Category | Month 1 | Month 2 | ... |
| --- | --- | --- | ... |
| Gifts | $50 | $300 | ... |
| Groceries |  | $40 | ... |
| Office Supplies |  | $25 | ... |

Feel free to add any other expenses you remember from last month, and we can update the table accordingly. As you continue to track your expenses, we can refine the table and get a better picture of your spending habits.

Remember, the goal is to get a general idea of your spending patterns, so don't worry too much about exact figures from previous months. We can work with estimates and adjust as needed.

Now, let's focus on tracking your expenses for the current month and beyond!
